Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |
| ITO |
| ZnO |
| MoO3 |
| Al |
